parameters.name: listtipo
parameters.description:
Choose the type of asset filter. The value corresponds to the following options:
     * *         1 => TypeID,
     * *         2 => LocationID,
     * *         3 => DepartmentID,
     * *         4 => StatusID,
     * *         5 => ClassificationID,
     * *         6 => CriticalityID
